nodes.text: The Grinder Dance Hall was an entertainment establishment and casino located in the town of Corestrike on the planet Chrona. Offering evening entertainment to the mining community, it was run by Lady Moira Kruger who won control of the establishment after a high-stakes sabacc game.

The Grinder contained a bar, which served drinks to patrons, and several tables offering games of chance including sabacc, sanchango, and hyper-dejarik. The criminal Themog hid out at the Grinder due to his romantic relationship with Lady Kruger.
